# WatchThisMovie

> Stop scrolling. Start watching. The AI-powered recommendation engine that knows your taste better than you do.

## About
WatchThisMovie is a movie discovery platform that uses a unique algorithm to help users find movies they will actually love, rather than just popular hits. It learns from user interactions (likes, dislikes, skips) to build a "Taste DNA" profile.

## Key Features
- **Smart Queue**: An endless feed of recommendations that adapts in real-time.
- **Taste DNA**: Visual analytics of your genre preferences and watching habits.
- **Privacy First**: We respect user data and do not sell it.

## Routes
- `/`: Landing Page
- `/rate`: The core rating interface.
- `/results`: View your personalized recommendations.
- `/watchlist`: Your saved movies.
- `/profile`: User settings and stats.
- `/cinephile/[username]`: Public profile to share your taste.

## API Usage
This site does not currently offer a public API for agents.

## Contact
For inquiries, please contact the maintainers via the GitHub repository or the social links on the footer.
